ferrothorn:BodyPress.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !B! damage. NL Affected by Block modifiers instead of Damage modifiers. NL Ignores Frail.

ferrothorn:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double if the enemy intends to attack.

ferrothorn:SeedBomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Seed+ to your hand. NL Double the damage NL of ALL Seed cards in your hand.

ferrothorn:Substitute.NAME: Substitute

ferrothorn:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Strength to the enemy. NL Stun. NL Exhaust.

Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.

ferrothorn:HeavySlam.NAME: Heavy Slam
ferrothorn:HeavySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to your Max HP exceeding 100. If Fatal, gain !M! Max HP.

ferrothorn:GyroBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each Relic you have.

ferrothorn:ShoreUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL In ferrothorn:Sandstorm gain as much Dexterity instead.
